SELECT
FROM company INNER JOIN recruit ON company.id= recruit.company_id INNER JOIN position ON recruit.id = position.recruit_id WHERE (DATE(recruit.start_time) >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AND DATE(recruit.start_time) <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i')) OR (DATE(recruit.end_time) >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AND DATE(recruit.end_time) <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i')) GROUP BY recruit.id ORDER BY recruit.start_time ASC;
